name: Powers (spYagami)
description:
REASONS TO PLAY:

POWERS is a Control inspired game. 

When the main character wakes up in the Power's HQ her only way out is to kill all of the rejects. Will you be able to do it?

CONTROLS:

'WASD' -  Movement

Press 'SHIFT' - Run

Press 'C' - Dash

'Mouse 0' - Zoom

Press 'E' to Hold items

Press 'X' to drop them

ESC - Pause

TO INSTALL: 
  1. Download the file (click the "download" button on this page).
  2. Right-click on the downloaded zip and "Extract All" to a folder. 
  3.  Enter the new folder and run "Powers.exe".
